words.definition: To learn about a subject, usually at school or university.
words.arabic_definition: يتعلم عن موضوع، عادة في المدرسة أو الجامعة.

words.definition: Practice or instruction to learn skills.

example.en: She is doing training for her new job.

words.definition: A set of lessons about a particular subject.
words.arabic_definition: مجموعة من الدروس حول موضوع معين.

example.en: I took a course in computer programming.

words.definition: A talk given by a teacher to students.
A test to check what someone has learned.

example.en: I have an exam next week.

words.definition: Work that students must do for school or university.
words.arabic_definition: عمل يجب على الطلاب القيام به في المدرسة أو الجامعة.

example.en: The teacher gave us a difficult assignment.

words.definition: To finish a degree or course successfully.
The ability to do something well.
To do something repeatedly to improve.

example.en: You need to practice speaking English.

words.definition: The latest time by which something must be done.
words.arabic_definition: الوقت الأخير الذي يجب إنجاز شيء ما فيه.

example.ar: الموعد النهائي للواجب هو يوم الجمعة.
